text:
Lyft | San Francisco, Seattle, NYC | ONSITE, FULL-TIME

It matters how you get there! Hiring senior positions across the board: iOS, Android, backend Python, Go, frontend React, data science. At this time focusing on candidates with >4 years professional experience (this is a hard requirement: if you have <4 years professional experience, recruiting will automatically reject you). Sorry, summer intern spots are already taken! Hit me up if you have any questions. Resumes to aderewecki@lyft.com.
